Credit Cards

IHG Credit Cards Boost Welcome Offers for New Holders

Many or all of the products on this page are from partners who compensate us when you click to or take an action on their website, but this does not influence our evaluations or ratings. Our opinions are our own.

Published May 29, 2025 11:16 a.m. PDT

Lead Writer & Content Strategist

The Chase-issued credit cards for the IHG hotel group are boosting their bonus offers for new cardholders. Starting May 29, 2025, applicants are eligible for the following:

  • IHG One Rewards Premier Credit Card: Earn 5 Free Nights — valued at up to 300,000 total points — after spending $5,000 on purchases in the first 3 months from account opening. Each free night is valued at up to 60,000 points. All told, the new welcome bonus offers more total value than the previous one. However, it has a higher spending requirement in the same amount of time. Plus, the new offer is for free night awards, meaning the offer will be less flexible in cases where a one-night IHG stay costs more than 60,000 points.

  • IHG One Rewards Traveler Credit Card: Earn 120,000 Bonus Points after spending $2,000 on purchases within the first 3 months of account opening. This is 40,000 more points than the card’s previous welcome bonus. 

NerdWallet values IHG points at 0.5 cent each. Points can be redeemed at more than 6,000 hotels and resorts in the IHG hotel program including InterContinental, Holiday Inn, Crowne Plaza, Kimpton and EVEN Hotels. You can also transfer points to airline partners or redeem them for gift cards and other members-only experiences, among other options.

Otherwise, terms and ongoing benefits of the IHG One Rewards Premier Credit Card and the IHG One Rewards Traveler Credit Card remain the same.

IHG One Rewards Traveler Credit Card

IHG One Rewards Premier Credit Card

Ongoing rewards

  • Up to 17 points total per $1 spent at IHG (5 from card, 10 from loyalty program, 2 from automatic elite status).

  • 3 points per $1 spent on monthly bills, gas stations and restaurants.

  • 2 points per $1 spent on all other purchases.

  • Up to 26 points total per $1 spent at IHG (10 from card, 10 from loyalty program, 6 from automatic elite status).

  • 5 points per $1 spent on travel, gas stations and restaurants.

  • 3 points per $1 spent on all other purchases.

Other perks

  • Fourth night free when redeeming rewards for four or more nights.

  • Earn Gold status when you spend $20,000 or more on your card in a calendar year.

  • Free anniversary night each year (up to 40,000 point value).

  • Fourth night free when redeeming rewards for four or more nights. Automatic Platinum status.

  • Get up to $50 United® Airlines TravelBank Cash each calendar year; registration required.
